trans-unit.source: Seeks forward in a data stream initially accessed by using the _WinAPI_BackupRead() or _WinAPI_BackupWrite() function

seg-source.mrk: Seeks forward in a data stream initially accessed by using the _WinAPI_BackupRead() or _WinAPI_BackupWrite() function

target.mrk: Seeks forward in a data stream initially accessed by using the _WinAPI_BackupRead() or _WinAPI_BackupWrite() function

trans-unit.source: Handle to the file or directory.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the file or directory.

target.mrk: Handle to the file or directory.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to seek.

seg-source.mrk: The number of bytes to seek.

target.mrk: The number of bytes to seek.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes the function actually seeks.

seg-source.mrk: The number of bytes the function actually seeks.

target.mrk: The number of bytes the function actually seeks.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an internal data structure. This structure must be the same structure that was initialized by the _WinAPI_BackupRead().

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to an internal data structure.
This structure must be the same structure that was initialized by the _WinAPI_BackupRead().

target.mrk: A pointer to an internal data structure.
This structure must be the same structure that was initialized by the _WinAPI_BackupRead().

trans-unit.source: An application must not touch the contents of this structure.

seg-source.mrk: An application must not touch the contents of this structure.

target.mrk: An application must not touch the contents of this structure.

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

trans-unit.source: Applications use the _WinAPI_BackupSeek() to skip portions of a data stream that cause errors.

seg-source.mrk: Applications use the _WinAPI_BackupSeek() to skip portions of a data stream that cause errors.

target.mrk: Applications use the _WinAPI_BackupSeek() to skip portions of a data stream that cause errors.

trans-unit.source: This function does not seek across stream headers.

seg-source.mrk: This function does not seek across stream headers.

target.mrk: This function does not seek across stream headers.
